title: Over in 3 weeks
creator_credit: Tom Ross, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Once Tom Ross and his fellow soldiers settled in Singapore, the bombing started. In three weeks, they were captured and sent to Changi, where Ross was a prisoner of war for three and a half years. Despite the abject conditions, Ross managed to survive through sheer determination and will to live.
